metadata.name: Sulfur Complete Ingredient Database
metadata.description: Comprehensive automated scraping of all ingredients from sulfur.wiki.gg

Anti-Poison Gum.name: Anti-Poison Gum
Anti-Poison Gum.description: Doesn't taste great but can be an antidote to toxins.

Banana.name: Banana
Banana.description: An elongated, edible fruit. Botanically a berry. Produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.

Bread.name: Bread
Bread.description: A loaf of freshly baked bread made of yeast, flour and water.

Butter.name: Butter
Butter.description: Cow's milk that has been churned into thick butter.

Cheese.name: Cheese
Cheese.description: Very tasty on its own. Or with bread. Smelly humans love it.

Egg.name: Egg
Egg.description: An uncooked egg. Could be eaten raw or used in cooking.

Flour.name: Flour
Flour.description: Someone worked long and hard to separate the wheat from the chaff. Then crushed into a fine powder. Useful in baking.

Fish.name: Fish
Fish.description: An uncooked of fish. May be cooked or eaten raw if prepared correctly.

Potato.name: Potato
Potato.description: The root of all roots. Edible but better nutrient value when cooked.

Salt.name: Salt
Salt.description: The white gold of millenia. Great to mix with liquid for broths, making foods tastier.

Rice.name: Rice
Rice.description: Bag of rice. Hard to digest when uncooked. Will swell up in contact with water, please don't feed it to birds, it might swell in their stomachs and they can get sick!

Beef Jerky.name: Beef Jerky
Beef Jerky.description: Dried and seasoned protein, most commonly from mammal origin. Responsible for creating truck drivers all over the world.

Berries.name: Berries
Berries.description: Sweet and sour colorful tiny fruits.

Cacao.name: Cacao
Cacao.description: This bitter powder is not very tasty on its own, but great for baking and sweet treats.

Herbs.name: Herbs
Herbs.description: Will help many dishes and treats become something extra.

Black Pepper.name: Black Pepper
Black Pepper.description: The black gold of millennia. Great to mix with liquid for broths, making food tastier.

Heart.name: Heart
Heart.description: The ticker. Used to keep everything going nice and steady.

Brain.name: Brain
Brain.description: The mind is a terrible thing to waste.

Bark.name: Bark
Bark.description: Tree husk, brittle enough to be crumbled into sawdust.

Bark Bread.name: Bark Bread
Bark Bread.description: A loaf of bread made from bark instead of flour. Filling but not very nourishing.

Beans.name: Beans
Beans.description: The mummies of food, made to be conserved in prepper basements everywhere for eons, or until the world ends.

Berry Jam.name: Berry Jam
Berry Jam.description: Berries crushed and boiled with sugar. Sweet and fruity.
craftingRecipes: Sugar + Berries + Berry Jam (Unsweetened) → Berry Jam

Bleach.name: Bleach
Bleach.description: Drag onto an item to repair it. Classic album. Decent anime. Also removes stains.

Blood.name: Blood
Blood.description: A vial of fresh, scarlet blood. Thicker than water.

Bone.name: Bone
Bone.description: Important part of the structure of most animals.

Bottled Caviar.name: Bottled Caviar
Bottled Caviar.description: Food consisting of salt-cured roe, also known as fish eggs.

Bottled Water.name: Bottled Water
Bottled Water.description: A 0.5L PET Bottle of water. It's half-empty.
Bottled Water.specialProperties: 5 health over 5 seconds, removes fire and poison

Broth.name: Broth
Broth.description: A healthy, warm and soothing broth. Salty.

Buttermilk.name: Buttermilk
Buttermilk.description: A product from the leftovers of cheese production.
Buttermilk.specialProperties: 15 health over 10 seconds, +50% accuracy while moving (120 seconds)

Chicken Leg.name: Chicken Leg
Chicken Leg.description: Must be cooked before eaten, or you might contract salmonella or helicobacter pylori.
Chicken Leg.specialProperties: Requires cooking to avoid foodborne illness

Chocolate Bar.name: Chocolate Bar
Chocolate Bar.description: Gives 25 health over 10 seconds. Mmm... Delicious!

Chocolate Syrup.name: Chocolate Syrup
craftingRecipes: Sugar + Cacao + Bottled Water → 2x Chocolate Syrup
Chocolate Bar + Bottled Water → 2x Chocolate Syrup

Christmas Spice.name: Christmas Spice
Christmas Spice.description: Powdered christmas spirit used for making things jolly.

Cloth.name: Cloth
Cloth.description: Bits of cloth of varous sizes.

Craw Flesh.name: Craw Flesh
Craw Flesh.description: Known to the Shav'Wa as dark poulet. Known to taste a bit like frog legs.

Craw Skin.name: Craw Skin
Craw Skin.description: The oily feathers repel water and insulates.

Dog Eye.name: Dog Eye
Dog Eye.description: Sounds a bit like the name for a flower, but upon closer examination it is certainly not.
Dog Eye.specialProperties: Can be given to Haukland Salesman (2 required) for Haukland Membership Card

Dog Flesh.name: Dog Flesh
Dog Flesh.description: A sizable part of man's best friend.

Dog Skin.name: Dog Skin
Dog Skin.description: Would look great on a dog!

False Sulfcap.name: False Sulfcap
False Sulfcap.description: This mushroom emits a faint glow and reeks of sulfsap. Easily mistaken for the Sulfcap, it carries a potent poison.

Fatberg Chunk.name: Fatberg Chunk
Fatberg Chunk.description: A rock-like mass of waste formed in sewers by the combination of non-biodegradable solids and fat.

Father's Shirt.name: Father's Shirt
Father's Shirt.description: A black shirt with a white Roman collar. You have worn this shirt for as long as you can remember.
Father's Shirt.specialProperties: Starter armor given to the Father every time they return from death

Flat Sandfish.name: Flat Sandfish
Flat Sandfish.description: An uncooked fish. May be cooked or eaten raw if prepared correctly.

Frog Leg.name: Frog Leg
Frog Leg.description: Might be usable for potions or exotic Human dishes.

Gravy.name: Gravy
Gravy.description: A white, brown, or gray standard sauce

Green Tea.name: Green Tea
Green Tea.description: Drinking this will make you feel confident wielding a sword.
Green Tea.specialProperties: +150% Melee damage for 60 seconds, Gives 10 health over 5 seconds, Removes Frozen status, Removes Poisoned status

Green Tunic.name: Green Tunic
Green Tunic.description: A finely made tunic of spun wool. Does not give you Poison Resistance.

Hellshrew Skin.name: Hellshrew Skin
Hellshrew Skin.description: It's so dry it almost breaks when handled.

Holy Toast.name: Holy Toast
Holy Toast.description: A toasted slice of bread is showing holy signs. Researchers call the phenomenon "face pareidolia."

Holy Water.name: Holy Water
Holy Water.description: A small container of water that has been blessed by the clergy.
Holy Water.specialProperties: Gives +1 Coyote Time for 90 seconds, Removes Burning, Removes Voodoo

Human Skin.name: Human Skin
Human Skin.description: The biggest organ in the human body. Congratulations, skin!

Intestines.name: Intestines
Intestines.description: A network of tubes and chambers where food goes to die.

Jello.name: Jello
Jello.description: A nine for presentation, a four for taste, and a one for nutrition.

Karl-Oskar.name: Karl-Oskar
Karl-Oskar.description: A large bolete mushroom. Can be used in cooking. Origin of name unknown.

Kidney.name: Kidney
Kidney.description: Filters your blood from all that bad stuff. Also makes piss!

Kidney Stone.name: Kidney Stone
Kidney Stone.description: Suprisingly hard. Full of salts and minerals.

Leverpastej.name: Leverpastej
Leverpastej.description: A human classic liver pâté to put on sandwiches. Great with butter and pickles.

Liquor.name: Liquor
Liquor.description: 40% distilled alcohol. Harms your health, makes you feel different.

Liver.name: Liver
Liver.description: Provided extremely important functions to it's original owner.

Low Fat Milk.name: Low Fat Milk
Low Fat Milk.description: A daily treat of governmentally funded propaganda. Now with less fat!

Lung.name: Lung
Lung.description: Used to give, and take, someones breath away.

Matcha.name: Matcha
Matcha.description: Smells wonderfully. Can be used to make green tea, or green tea flavored treats.

Metal Scrap.name: Metal Scrap
Metal Scrap.description: Various metal scraps, screws and bolts.

Mineral Water.name: Mineral Water
Mineral Water.description: A 0.5L PET Bottle containing pure spring water with trace amounts of essential minerals. It's half-empty.

Mystery Meat.name: Mystery Meat
Mystery Meat.description: An easy and simple way to eat several meats at once! A human classic!

Nut Mix.name: Nut Mix
Nut Mix.description: A bag with mixed nuts. Healthy combo of fat and protein.

Oats.name: Oats
Oats.description: Great for baking or making porridge.

Pancreas.name: Pancreas
Pancreas.description: In this little factory, beta cells work tirelessly to create insulin for the host. If you don't have diabetes that is.

Peanut.name: Peanut
Peanut.description: Easy to crack. Tasty and nutritious.

Peanut Butter.name: Peanut Butter
Peanut Butter.description: Peanuts ground and worked into a thick paste. Added emulsification agents make it more spreadable out of the jar.

Pizza.name: Pizza
Pizza.description: A large pizza. Will make you feel stuffed. It's better to slice it.
Pizza.specialProperties: +150 health over 10 seconds, -10% Jump power for 15 seconds, -10% Movement speed for 15 seconds

Porridge.name: Porridge
Porridge.description: A foul smelling slop of Corpseflower Oats and Goblin Milk.

Red Wine.name: Red Wine
Red Wine.description: Red liquid made from trampled and fermented red grapes. Nice bouqet. Tastes a bit like Jesus.
Red Wine.specialProperties: Gives 30 health over 10 seconds, Removes Poisoned status

Rhubarb.name: Rhubarb
Rhubarb.description: Astrologers proclaim the week of the rhubarb. All dwellings increase population.

Rhubarb Sauce.name: Rhubarb Sauce
Rhubarb Sauce.description: Destroyed rhubarb mixed with sugar, presented in a bowl.

Robot Hydraul.name: Robot Hydraul
Robot Hydraul.description: Gives mechanics a weighty snap and power needed for quick reactions.

Robot Septacoil.name: Robot Septacoil
Robot Septacoil.description: Gives robots that springy step, or that recoily force.

Rock.name: Rock
Rock.description: If you put something between this and a hard place it might be physically altered, or at least pressured.

Rubber.name: Rubber
Rubber.description: A useful material made of natural polymer of isoprene and elastomer. Might be dialectically synonomous with human household objects.

R\u00f6dsopp.name: Rödsopp
R\u00f6dsopp.description: This mushroom stings to the touch, but emits a pleasant, metallic odor. It makes you feel slightly woozy, but can probably be used in cooking.

Salted Fish.name: Salted Fish
Salted Fish.description: Fish cured with dry salt. Preserved for later eating.

Seaweed.name: Seaweed
Seaweed.description: Dried edible seaweed used in cooking, made from species of the red algae genus. It has a strong and distinctive flavor, and is often used to wrap around rice, like onigiri.

Shav'Wa Flesh.name: Shav'Wa Flesh
Shav'Wa Flesh.description: Smells like... sweet fish. Hard to describe.

Skimmed Milk.name: Skimmed Milk
Skimmed Milk.description: A daily treat of governmentally funded propaganda. Now with even less fat!
Skimmed Milk.specialProperties: +50% Accuracy when moving for 90 seconds, Gives 10 health over 5 seconds, Removes Frozen status

Snail.name: Snail
Snail.description: Cold and slimey. Not very appetizing. Might contain lungworms.

Soda.name: Soda
Soda.description: A sweet, carbonated beverage in an aluminium can. Lime flavor.
specialProperties: Gives 50% Accuracy when moving for 40 seconds

Solution.name: Solution
Solution.description: A liquid with many purposes. Might be the solution you need.

Spaghetti.name: Spaghetti
Spaghetti.description: Packet containing noodles made of wheat flour and eggs

Spice Mix.name: Spice Mix
Spice Mix.description: An exotic mix of spices that can be used for many purposes.

Spleen.name: Spleen
Spleen.description: A must have for any blood user.

Sports Drink.name: Sports Drink
Sports Drink.description: A 0.5L PET Bottle of finest sports drink filled to the brim with electrolytes, caffeine and essential minerals.
specialProperties: -0.5 Weapon weight movement penalty for 180 seconds

Stick.name: Stick
Stick.description: Nothing compares to a really good stick.

Stout.name: Stout
Stout.description: A very rich dark beer, that leaves a mustache.

Swing-Ding.name: Swing-Ding
Swing-Ding.description: Small mushrooms rich in nitrogen. Popular use in potions.

Thyroid.name: Thyroid
Thyroid.description: An organ roughly the shape of a certain rap group logo. Apparently secretes hormones all over your body? Yuck.

Tongue.name: Tongue
Tongue.description: The talky lick muscle. Makes things taste like stuff.

Tube Caviar.name: Tube Caviar
Tube Caviar.description: Savory, intense, Fishy. Love it or hate it.
